ğŸ“° Octant steps up climate game

Octant, a platform redirecting staked ETH revenue to fund public-good Web3 projects, has announced a new climate-focused funding round, offering significantly larger grants than typical Gitcoin Climate Solutions rounds. The initiative aims to empower grassroots climate projects with consistent funding while testing emerging impact verification systems. In the latest CARBON Copy newsletter, we explore how Octant highlights the potential of regenerative finance to scale climate impact and set a new standard for wealth stewardship in the Web3 space.
